nodes.text: Evil Never Dies: The Sith Dynasties

"Evil Never Dies: The Sith Dynasties" is an online supplement to Star Wars Insider 88. The article is written by Abel G. Peña, and is an exclusive Hyperspace publication. It comprehensively covers the full history of the Sith. It was announced in June 2006.

While information is given concerning the second and fourth Great Schisms, no information is given on the first and third in this article. Since the first actually came before the creation of Dark Lords of the Sith, that is understandable. However, the lack of information on the Third Great Schism may indicate that the Dark Jedi involved did not associate with the Sith.
